title: I receive this crash when i start the game

replies.body:
Bugsplat errors like this are typically an indication that a poor interaction is happening between the Client and your hardware. I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it covers the most common solutions for this issue.

If you still run into these errors after taking those steps, let me know.
